title: Experience One of Vietnam’s Top Luxury Hotels with Daily Spa Treatments & More
description: Surrender to complete relaxation at Fusion Resort Cam Ranh, a palm-fringed oasis overlooking the sparkling waters of the South China Sea in a serene location between Cam Ranh and Nha Trang. Stay in a spacious and airy suite or villa with tropical views and enjoy breakfast anywhere, anytime - whether that’s in your suite or by the beach - your choice of lunch or dinner daily, a daily spa treatment each at the serene Maia Spa, a nightly cocktail each and return airport transfers.
offer_address: LotD10B, Nguyễn Tất Thành Street, Bãi Đông, Cam Hải Đông, Cam Lâm, Cam Lâm, Khánh Hòa 000000, Vietnam
